subject: Submissions are due soon!
body: We will have a 15 minute buffer window for technical difficulties by 9:15 PM, but after this submissions will no longer be accepted. In the meantime, you can relax and stay until the closing ceremony!

subject: Project submissions are due at 9:00 P.M. on Devpost (hoth9.devpost.com)
body: Start wrapping up and preparing to submit!

subject: Lunch and the JEDI allyship space are currently taking place!
body: Lunch is being served, and the allyship space is on the terrace. Get some food and come to the allyship space for raffle points!

subject: Breakfast Updates
body: Hello Hackers! For those of you who haven't gotten your breakfast item yet, we are expecting to be able to serve you around 10am! Until then feel free fuel up on coffee on the Terrace ☕

subject: Opening ceremony starts soon!
body: If you are at home, here is the zoom link: https://ucla.zoom.us/j/91728029021?pwd=N2EwT3FNVHR4YjljRW9JaVZCc3NXQT09

subject: Time to check in!
body: In person check in is taking place at Covel Grand Horizon! Whether you are in person or virtual, also make sure to fill out the discord check in form in #hoth-getting-started!
